attributes.review: Too much spam and this thing does not work even a little bit and it’s making other pets of my phone glitch as well and is a concern to me
attributes.title: Doesn’t work

attributes.review: Just makes my phone keep crashing, when I tried to sign up it crashed. And I finally got it too work and tbh it’s the dumbest app ever. It’s so boring and there’s nothing your really do on it.
attributes.title: Hate it

attributes.review: When I downloaded the app, I started having nightmares about a giant cheeto man wearing a suit. When I first interacted with/used the app, a man came and burned my house down. I think this app has a curse attached to it and it needs to be removed immediately.
attributes.title: THIS APP IS THE WORST

attributes.review: This app only gives stupid updates I don’t care about.  Had to delete because it was basically spam messages and it blew up my phone.  If I could give a 0 I would I hated it!!!
attributes.title: Trash

attributes.review: This app literally bricked my iPhone 6. I had to purchase an entire new iPhone, because the moment I downloaded this, my screen went black and my phone refused to turn back on.
attributes.title: Do NOT Download

attributes.review: This app is trash. I actually checked it out and it just makes your phone crash and sends you an unnecessary amount of notifications.
attributes.title: This app is just like poorly made

attributes.title: Ugly dump trump

attributes.review: This app is the sole reason why i have lost all of my braincells. Not only did it erase my memories, it also made my phone glitch and eventually catch fire. 😗✌🏼. attributes.review: I thought I was downloading a politician’s app but DONT BE FOOLED! He isn’t a politician he’s an idiot! This is scarier than all of the horror games I’ve ever played! Slender doesn’t even compete! This I opened the app and first thing I saw *boom* Chester the Cheeto cheetah.
attributes.title: I didn’t realize I downloaded a horror game!
